data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.partBlankContent: Pat recently was given a robot vacuum. The ro___ travels ov__ your flo___ while suc____ up di__ and du__. Although t__ robot ta___ longer t_ vacuum, it i_ more effi_____. Also, it is easier to vacuum more frequently since the human doesn't have to do any work.
data.fullContent: Pat recently was given a robot vacuum. The robot travels over your floors while sucking up dirt and dust. Although the robot takes longer to vacuum, it is more efficient. Also, it is easier to vacuum more frequently since the human doesn't have to do any work.
data.answer: Pat最近得到了一个机器人吸尘器。机器人在你的地板上移动，同时吸走灰尘。虽然机器人吸尘的时间更长，但效率更高。而且，更频繁地吸尘也更容易，因为人类不需要做任何工作。
